ModMetaData.name: Deep's Resource Alert
ModMetaData.author: Deep
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6.0 This mod for RimWorld adds a manageable notification system that alerts players when the quantity of a resource or category in stock falls below a desired amount.
To set a threshold, use LeftShift + Click on a resource or category in the Resource Readout (on the left side of the screen), and then enter the desired number. If you wish to remove a resource from the watch list, simply type in 0.
